name: Benthic Algal Biomass
functionStatement: Organic matter is captured and broken down, fueling food webs, balancing production/ respiration, moderating pH/ redox, and supplying nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Indicator of primary production or detrital processing that supports food webs and stream metabolism.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Collect periphyton/algal samples (or estimate biomass) and compute chlorophyll-a or biomass metric; apply SQT thresholds by biotype.

inputs.label: Benthic Algal Biomass
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field/lab primary production or decomposition measurements; macroinvertebrate functional group counts.

references: EPA/USGS periphyton/chlorophyll sampling guidance where applicable
